Package tuitions

Class Student

java.lang.Object
tuitions.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonResident, Resident
public class Student extends Object
The Student superclass that stores the attributes of each student and their financial aid information. Use this class to populate attributes into a new Student object.
Author:
Tommy Cho

      A parameterized constructor for the student object

      major - Major of the student in string form
      creditHours - Credit hours the student is taking in integer form

      public boolean getMadePayment()
      A getter method for whether a student made a payment already or not
      Returns:
      true if a payment has been made, false otherwise

    • setMadePayment

      public void setMadePayment(boolean s)
      A setter for whether a student made a payment already or not
      Parameters:
      s - true if the student made a payment, false if they didn't

    • tuitionDue

      public void tuitionDue()
      The do-nothing method of calculating tuition. The other sub-classes will have a method with the same name that will override this one.

    • payTuition

      public void payTuition(double amount, Date datePaid)
      A method lets a student pay their tuition
      Parameters:
      amount - integer value of how much the student is paying right now
      datePaid - date that the student is paying their tuition
